entry.value: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS RECORD_COMPARISON_${JobListID}_${DataflowSequence}_${FlowID} AS ( select final_result.*,current_timestamp as create_dt,'NiFi Record Comparison' as created_by from ( select A.*, '${SourceObjectName}' as TABLE_NAME from (${PreSQL}) as A union all select B.*, '${DestinationObjectName}' as TABLE_NAME from (${PostSQL}) as B ) as final_result group by ${KeyColumn} having count(*)=1 order by ${KeyColumn} )

from org.apache.commons.io import IOUtils from java.nio.charset import StandardCharsets from org.apache.nifi.processor.io import StreamCallback # Define a subclass of StreamCallback for use in session.write() class PyStreamCallback(StreamCallback): def __init__(self): pass def process(self, inputStream, outputStream): text = IOUtils.toString(inputStream, StandardCharsets.UTF_8) header_value='' pass_value='' fail_value='' self.validation_check_flag=0 line_list = text.split("\n") j=0 for i in line_list: if j==0: header_value=''+i+'' elif j==1 and i.strip()=='0': outputStream.write(bytearray('Record comparison validation check passed.'.encode('utf-8'))) pass_value=''+ i +'' self.validation_check_flag=1 elif j==1 and int(i.strip())>0: outputStream.write(bytearray('Record comparison validation check failed.'.encode('utf-8'))) self.validation_check_flag=0 fail_value=''+ i +'' j=j+1 final_value=header_value+pass_value+fail_value main_html_body=''+final_value+'
' outputStream.write(bytearray(main_html_body.encode('utf-8'))) # end class flowFile = session.get() if(flowFile != None): PyStreamCallbackObj = PyStreamCallback() flowFile = session.write(flowFile, PyStreamCallbackObj) if(PyStreamCallbackObj.validation_check_flag==1): session.putAttribute(flowFile,"MESSAGE","Record comparison validation check passed") else: session.putAttribute(flowFile,"MESSAGE","Record comparison validation check failed") session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS) session.commit()

select '${JobListID}' as JobListID ,'${DataflowSequence}' as DataflowSequence ,'${AggregationType}' as AGGREGATION_TYPE ,'${LogicalComparisonType}' as LOGICAL_COMPARISON_TYPE ,final.KEY_VALUE ,final.SOURCE_TABLE ,final.SOURCE_AGGREGATED_VALUE ,final.TARGET_TABLE ,final.TARGET_AGGREGATED_VALUE ,'${ThresholdValue}' as THRESHOLD_VALUE , case when LENGTH('${ThresholdValue}')>0 then case when (final.SOURCE_AGGREGATED_VALUE-final.TARGET_AGGREGATED_VALUE)<=(SUBSTRING_INDEX('${ThresholdValue}',':',1)) AND (final.SOURCE_AGGREGATED_VALUE-final.TARGET_AGGREGATED_VALUE)>=(SUBSTRING_INDEX('${ThresholdValue}',':',-1)) then 'PASS' else 'FAIL' end else case when final.SOURCE_AGGREGATED_VALUE ${LogicalComparisonType} final.TARGET_AGGREGATED_VALUE then 'PASS' else 'FAIL' end end as STATUS ,current_timestamp as create_dt ,'NiFi_Validation' as created_by ,${FlowID} as FlowID
from ( select main.SOURCE_AGGREGATED_VALUE ,main.SOURCE_TABLE ,main.TARGET_AGGREGATED_VALUE ,main.TARGET_TABLE ,main.KEY_VALUE ,'${ThresholdValue}' as THRESHOLD_VALUE from ( select COALESCE(core.SOURCE_KEY_VALUE,core.TARGET_KEY_VALUE) as KEY_VALUE ,'SOURCE_TABLE' as SOURCE_TABLE ,'TARGET_TABLE' as TARGET_TABLE ,COALESCE(core.SOURCE_AGGREGATED_VALUE,0) as SOURCE_AGGREGATED_VALUE ,COALESCE(core.TARGET_AGGREGATED_VALUE,0) as TARGET_AGGREGATED_VALUE from ( select A.sumValue as SOURCE_AGGREGATED_VALUE ,B.sumValue as TARGET_AGGREGATED_VALUE ,A.${KeyColumn} as SOURCE_KEY_VALUE ,B.${KeyColumn} as TARGET_KEY_VALUE from (${PreSQL}) as A left join (${PostSQL}) as B on A.${KeyColumn}=B.${KeyColumn} union all select A.sumValue as SOURCE_AGGREGATED_VALUE ,B.sumValue as TARGET_AGGREGATED_VALUE ,A.${KeyColumn} as SOURCE_KEY_VALUE ,B.${KeyColumn} as TARGET_KEY_VALUE from (${PreSQL}) as A right join (${PostSQL}) as B on A.${KeyColumn}=B.${KeyColumn} where A.${KeyColumn} is null ) as core ) as main ) as final

select final.JobListID ,final.DataflowSequence ,'${AggregationType}' as AGGREGATION_TYPE ,'${LogicalComparisonType}' as LOGICAL_COMPARISON_TYPE ,final.SOURCE_TABLE ,final.SOURCE_AGGREGATED_VALUE ,final.TARGET_TABLE ,final.TARGET_AGGREGATED_VALUE ,'${ThresholdValue}' as THRESHOLD_VALUE , case when Length('${ThresholdValue}')>0 then case when (final.SOURCE_AGGREGATED_VALUE-final.TARGET_AGGREGATED_VALUE)<=(SUBSTRING_INDEX('${ThresholdValue}',':',1)) AND (final.SOURCE_AGGREGATED_VALUE-final.TARGET_AGGREGATED_VALUE)>=(SUBSTRING_INDEX('${ThresholdValue}',':',-1)) then 'PASS' else 'FAIL' end else case when final.SOURCE_AGGREGATED_VALUE = final.TARGET_AGGREGATED_VALUE then 'PASS' else 'FAIL' end end as STATUS ,current_timestamp as create_dt ,'NiFi_Validation' as created_by ,${FlowID} as FlowID
from ( select src.JobListID ,src.DataflowSequence ,src.rowCount as SOURCE_AGGREGATED_VALUE ,src.table_name as SOURCE_TABLE ,tgt.rowCount as TARGET_AGGREGATED_VALUE ,tgt.table_name as TARGET_TABLE
from ( select '${JobListID}' as JobListID,'${DataflowSequence}' as DataflowSequence,A.rowCount, 'SOURCE_TABLE' as table_name from ( ${PreSQL} ) as A ) as src inner join ( select '${JobListID}' as JobListID,'${DataflowSequence}' as DataflowSequence,B.rowCount,'TARGET_TABLE' as table_name from ( ${PostSQL} ) as B ) as tgt on src.JobListID=tgt.JobListID and src.DataflowSequence=tgt.DataflowSequence ) as final

from org.apache.commons.io import IOUtils from java.nio.charset import StandardCharsets from org.apache.nifi.processor.io import StreamCallback # Define a subclass of StreamCallback for use in session.write() class PyStreamCallback(StreamCallback): def __init__(self): pass def process(self, inputStream, outputStream): text = IOUtils.toString(inputStream, StandardCharsets.UTF_8) self.validation_check_flag=0 line_list = text.split("\n") pass_value='' fail_value='' final_value='' for i in line_list: my_list = i.split(",") if len(my_list)>1: if 'PASS' in my_list: self.validation_check_flag=1 pass_value=''+my_list[2]+''+my_list[3]+''+my_list[4]+' '+my_list[5]+''+my_list[6]+''+my_list[7]+''+my_list[8]+''+my_list[9]+'' outputStream.write(bytearray('Validation Check Passed'.encode('utf-8'))) elif 'FAIL' in my_list: self.validation_check_flag=0 fail_value=''+my_list[2]+''+my_list[3]+''+my_list[4]+' '+my_list[5]+''+my_list[6]+''+my_list[7]+''+my_list[8]+''+my_list[9]+'' outputStream.write(bytearray('Validation Check Failed'.encode('utf-8'))) else: header_value=''+my_list[2]+''+my_list[3]+''+my_list[4]+' '+my_list[5]+''+my_list[6]+''+my_list[7]+''+my_list[8]+''+my_list[9]+'' final_value=header_value+pass_value+fail_value main_html_body=''+final_value+'
' outputStream.write(bytearray(main_html_body.encode('utf-8'))) # end class flowFile = session.get() if(flowFile != None): PyStreamCallbackObj = PyStreamCallback() flowFile = session.write(flowFile, PyStreamCallbackObj) if(PyStreamCallbackObj.validation_check_flag==1): session.putAttribute(flowFile,"MESSAGE","validation check passed") else: session.putAttribute(flowFile,"MESSAGE","validation check failed") session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS) session.commit()

INSERT INTO depottransform.joblog ( NifiTemplateName, DataFlowID, JobType, Row_count, SourceTable, Started, Ended, CreateDateTime, Script, JobFlowRunID, JobListID) VALUES ( 'Data Validation', ${ID}, 'JobStart', 0, '', current_timestamp(), current_timestamp(), current_timestamp(),'', ${FlowID}, ${JobListID});

INSERT INTO depottransform.joblog ( NifiTemplateName, DataFlowID, JobType, Row_count, SourceTable, Started, Ended, CreateDateTime, Script, JobFlowRunID, JobListID) VALUES ( 'Data Validation', ${ID}, 'JobEnd', 0, '', current_timestamp(), current_timestamp(), current_timestamp(),'', ${FlowID}, ${JobListID});
